title: Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 

(Minister of State at the Department of Foreign Affairs) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department foreign affairs) order 2022

title: Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. Daniel Griffin, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Daniel Griffin, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Foreign Affairs, is appointed to be a Special 
Adviser to Thomas Byrne, Minister of State at the Department of Foreign 
Affairs, on a temporary basis, with effect from 19 April 2022. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

28 June, 2022. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 1st July, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [336] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
